attributes.action: teach students how to live an adult life (insurance ,tax ,rent, etc)
attributes.additional_details: i want the government to teach students from year 10 up how to live an adult life so it properly prepares our kids to live in the real world of being an adult. this will leave less stress on the young adults when life tearns into a reality
attributes.background: ive just had my first accident with my motor vehicle and i had no clue of how to exchange insurance and how to get claims, also, young adults are starting to move out of homes with no idea of how to pay rent, tax and insurance to many other things.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Legally require all secondary schools in England to teach financial education
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701663
